snippet: Colorado and Washington State will serve as test cases for full-on legalization.
abstract: Editorial contends that Colorado and Washington State will serve as test cases for full-on legalization of marijuana; highlights ways in which the experiments can be judged, such as the fate of the black market, under-age smoking, marketing, interstate trafficking, and any effects on alcohol consumption.
lead_paragraph: Colorado and Washington State will serve as test cases for full-on legalization.
